A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Could never live up to expectations but came awfully close. The fact of the matter is that it is nearly impossible to give a character 30 years of development without making some people mad with how the character developed. The special effects were beautiful\, the plot twists were well done\, and I actually found the comedy to be quite well done\, which seems to be a polarizing opinion. I can understand people being frustrated by the story not going the way they expected\, but there is no world in which this deserves a 56%.
